description.value:
A healing wave splashes across creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], its cleansing water driving afflictions from the body. Each creature in the area regains 3d8 HP and can attempt a new save against one poison or disease affliction affecting it; on a failed save, the condition doesn't worsen.

Each creature that benefited from this impulse becomes temporarily immune to Torrent in the Blood for 10 minutes.

Level (+2) The healing increases by 1d8.

[[/r (floor((max(6,@actor.level)-6)/2)+3)d8[healing]]]{Leveled HP}
